title: Calendula

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may aid a player at night, granting them Powerful Defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will know the roles of the players that attack your target.
- If your target is attacked, they will not know that they were attacked.
- You will know if your target is attacked.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to aid (player)."
"Your target was attacked!"
"Your target was attacked by a (role).

desc:
Post 158
*You are a powerful wizard that can heal people with their hands.*
